title: Djokovic improves to 25-0 at China Open with 1st-round win
text: All the latest economic and financial news, as China’s factory output falls at its fastest pace in six years 8.20am BST *In the City, shares have jumped... guardian.co.uk 5 days ago - UK Johanna Konta claimed the biggest scalp of her blossoming career by beating world number two Simona Halep at the Wuhan Open in China.The 24-year-old is set to... Western Morning News 6 days ago - Sport Also reported by • City A.M. • British No1 stages superb recovery to win 6-3 3-6 7-5 • 24-year-old secures quarter-final against Venus Williams Johanna Konta claimed the biggest... guardian.co.uk 6 days ago - Sports Also reported by • FOX Sports *Wuhan (China):* Venus Williams beat Julia Goerges at the Wuhan Open to reach 700 career wins yesterday, the only active women's player to achieve the milestone...
